post.body: my husband is on a submarine. The communication is very very limited. He calls when he can which is only when the port
any letter are prewriten before deployments and are mailed by the FRG letters
my husband is not able to send letter frequently enough to even bother writing any. Plus she would just want to tear it
tooo bad my hubby cant call home
I am in CT. It is cold and windy and we had a BIG snow fall last week but it is gone now.
creative but hey, a parenting magazine could make it nice and balanced!
I have never heard of all*you, must check it out! Cookie is a great magzine but not what I have filed under inspiration or
what are your thoughts on jean jackets? Are the a piece fights the frump or makes the frump?
there are natural ones? oh man....I think I'll just ignore that ;)
hmm I like that idea!
ok...well I'm not that bad!
your welcome! How are you enjoying Korea?
something has to change or I fear co-sleeping will have to end.
she has bags under her eyes yet she still won't sleep. She calls out for daddy every night. This is breaking my heart
I understand that my daughter misses my husband & that night time especially brings this out but OH MY GOSH SHE JUST WON'T SLEEP!
jean jackets? yay or nay? hot or not? please tell me why
I'm think of buying some magazine subscriptions. It will help boost my creativity, help with inspiration, & make checking the mail more fun!
you may not believe this but not untila month ago did I ever try Cheetos. Now they will be the death of me.
Want to give a shout out to a new Army wife who is new to blogging and twitter? @ArmyWife88 or find her here http://awburns.blogspot.com/
I found a new army wife & NEW to blogging! Military wives & bloggy friends can you show her some support & love? http://awburns.blogspot.com
